data.title: California orders Weedmaps to stop advertising unlicensed marijuana businesses
data.excerpt: The California Bureau of Cannabis Control sent a cease-and-desist letter last month to Irvine-based Ghost Management Group, the owner of popular marijuana dispensary finder Weedmaps.com, ordering the company to stop advertising unlicensed operators or face unspecified “criminal and administrative penalties.”
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
